handle_discord¶

Discord API to host several functionalities.

Currently supported modules are:

pycmd

getmedia

Functions

main()

Run Discord Bot.

on_message(message)

Treat the content of the message depending on pythonState.

on_ready()

Notify successful connection to Discord server.

bananaBread
